Articles.Content: Hey I'm not sure if this is the right place to post this but, docking is impossible right now. whenever i select a target like a space station and get close there no icon that say "name here 12.2km" whats wrong here? and is there any way to fix this? thank you for any replies!

F4 toggles ship labels. You don't really need them for docking, though, typically I fly off the navball until I'm at about 300m and by then it's in visual range (possibly because I accidentally turned off the ship labels when I first started playing and didn't figure out how to turn them back on for a long time (I think it happens to everybody at some point)).
